sentences.sContent: If we in fact had the right level of investment in aeronautics, we would not currently be competing with Airbus.
sentences.sContent_eng: If we in fact had the right level of investment in aeronautics, we would not currently be competing with Airbus.
sentences.sCn: 如果我们真的在航空领域投入了足够多的资金，现在就绝不会还在与空中客车缠斗了。

sentences.sContent: Although it was a great hobby for her, she wanted to study aeronautics or astronomy as a career.
sentences.sContent_eng: Although it was a great hobby for her, she wanted to study aeronautics or astronomy as a career.
sentences.sCn: 不过这只是她一大爱好，她本想学习航空或天文作为职业。

words.tran: 航空的；航空学的；飞机驾驶员的（等于aeronautic）

trans.tranOther: the science of designing and flying planes
